00049 //For File I/O
00050 #define OSCL_HAS_GLOB 0
00051 #define OSCL_HAS_ANSI_FILE_IO_SUPPORT 1
00052 #define OSCL_HAS_SYMBIAN_COMPATIBLE_IO_FUNCTION 0
00053 #define OSCL_HAS_NATIVE_FILE_CACHE_ENABLE 1
00054 #define OSCL_FILE_BUFFER_MAX_SIZE       32768
00055 #define OSCL_HAS_PV_FILE_CACHE  0

00057 //For Sockets
00058 #define OSCL_HAS_SYMBIAN_SOCKET_SERVER 0
00059 #define OSCL_HAS_SYMBIAN_DNS_SERVER 0
00060 #define OSCL_HAS_BERKELEY_SOCKETS 1
00061 #define OSCL_HAS_SOCKET_SUPPORT 1
00062 
00063 //basic socket types
00064 typedef int TOsclSocket;
00065 typedef struct sockaddr_in TOsclSockAddr;
00066 typedef socklen_t TOsclSockAddrLen;
00067 
00068 //Init addr macro, inet_addr returns an uint32
00069 #define OsclValidInetAddr(addr) (inet_addr(addr)!=INADDR_NONE)
00070 
00071 //address conversion macro-- from string to network address.
00072 #define OsclMakeSockAddr(sockaddr,port,addrstr,ok)\
00073         sockaddr.sin_family=OSCL_AF_INET;\
00074         sockaddr.sin_port=htons(port);\
00075         int32 result=inet_aton((const char*)addrstr,&sockaddr.sin_addr);\
00076         ok=(result!=0);
00077 
00078 //address conversion macro-- from network address to string
00079 #define OsclUnMakeSockAddr(sockaddr,addrstr)\
00080         addrstr=inet_ntoa(sockaddr.sin_addr);
00081 
00082 //wrappers for berkeley socket calls
00083 #define OsclSetRecvBufferSize(s,val,ok,err) \
00084         ok=(setsockopt(s,SOL_SOCKET,SO_RCVBUF,(char*)&val, sizeof(int)) !=-1);\
00085         if (!ok)err=errno
00086 
00087 #define OsclBind(s,addr,ok,err)\
00088     TOsclSockAddr* tmpadr = &addr;\
00089     sockaddr* sadr = OSCL_STATIC_CAST(sockaddr*, tmpadr);\
00090         ok=(bind(s,sadr,sizeof(addr))!=(-1));\
00091         if (!ok)err=errno
00092 
00093 #define OsclJoin(s,addr,ok,err)\
00094 {\
00095                 struct ip_mreq mreq; \
00096             void* p = &addr; \
00097             ok=(bind(s,(sockaddr*)p,sizeof(addr))!=(-1));\
00098         mreq.imr_multiaddr.s_addr = addr.sin_addr.s_addr ; \
00099         mreq.imr_interface.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY); \
00100         ok=(setsockopt(s, IPPROTO_IP, IP_ADD_MEMBERSHIP, &mreq, sizeof(struct ip_mreq))!=(-1)); \
00101         if (!ok)err=errno;\
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 #define OsclListen(s,size,ok,err)\
00106         ok=(listen(iSocket,qSize)!=(-1));\
00107         if (!ok)err=errno
00108 
00109 #define OsclAccept(s,accept_s,ok,err,wouldblock)\
00110         accept_s=accept(s,NULL,NULL);\
00111         ok=(accept_s!=(-1));\
00112         if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN||err==EWOULDBLOCK);}
00113 
00114 #define OsclSetNonBlocking(s,ok,err)\
00115         ok=(fcntl(s,F_SETFL,O_NONBLOCK)!=(-1));\
00116         if (!ok)err=errno
00117 
00118 #define OsclShutdown(s,how,ok,err)\
00119         ok=(shutdown(iSocket,how)!=(-1));\
00120         if (!ok)err=errno
00121 
00122 #define OsclSocket(s,fam,type,prot,ok,err)\
00123         s=socket(fam,type,prot);\
00124         ok=(s!=(-1));\
00125         if (!ok)err=errno
00126 
00127 #define OsclSendTo(s,buf,len,addr,ok,err,nbytes,wouldblock)\
00128     TOsclSockAddr* tmpadr = &addr;\
00129     sockaddr* sadr = OSCL_STATIC_CAST(sockaddr*, tmpadr);\
00130         nbytes=sendto(s,(const void*)(buf),(size_t)(len),0,sadr,(socklen_t)sizeof(addr));\
00131         ok=(nbytes!=(-1));\
00132         if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN||err==EWOULDBLOCK);}
00133 
00134 #define OsclSend(s,buf,len,ok,err,nbytes,wouldblock)\
00135         nbytes=send(s,(const void*)(buf),(size_t)(len),0);\
00136         ok=(nbytes!=(-1));\
00137         if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN||err==EWOULDBLOCK);}
00138 
00139 #define OsclCloseSocket(s,ok,err)\
00140         ok=(close(s)!=(-1));\
00141         if (!ok)err=errno
00142 
00143 #define OsclConnect(s,addr,ok,err,wouldblock)\
00144     TOsclSockAddr* tmpadr = &addr;\
00145     sockaddr* sadr = OSCL_STATIC_CAST(sockaddr*, tmpadr);\
00146         ok=(connect(s,sadr,sizeof(addr))!=(-1));\
00147         if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EINPROGRESS);}
00148 
00149 #define OsclGetAsyncSockErr(s,ok,err)\
00150         int opterr;socklen_t optlen=sizeof(opterr);\
00151         ok=(getsockopt(s,SOL_SOCKET,SO_ERROR,(void *)&opterr,&optlen)!=(-1));\
00152         if(ok)err=opterr;else err=errno;
00153 
00154 //unix reports connect completion in write set in the getsockopt
00155 //error.
00156 #define OsclConnectComplete(s,wset,eset,success,fail,ok,err)\
00157         success=fail=false;\
00158         if (FD_ISSET(s,&eset))\
00159         {fail=true;OsclGetAsyncSockErr(s,ok,err);}\
00160         else if (FD_ISSET(s,&wset))\
00161         {OsclGetAsyncSockErr(s,ok,err);if (ok && err==0)success=true;else fail=true;}
00162 
00163 #define OsclRecv(s,buf,len,ok,err,nbytes,wouldblock)\
00164         nbytes=recv(s,(void *)(buf),(size_t)(len),0);\
00165         ok=(nbytes!=(-1));\
00166         if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN);}
00167 
00168 #define OsclRecvFrom(s,buf,len,paddr,paddrlen,ok,err,nbytes,wouldblock)\
00169 {\
00170 void* p=paddr;\
00171 nbytes=recvfrom(s,(void*)(buf),(size_t)(len),0,(struct sockaddr*)p,paddrlen);\
00172         ok=(nbytes!=(-1));\
00173         if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN);}\
00174 }
00175 
00176 
00177 #define OsclSocketSelect(nfds,rd,wr,ex,timeout,ok,err,nhandles)\
00178         nhandles=select(nfds,&rd,&wr,&ex,&timeout);\
00179         ok=(nhandles!=(-1));\
00180         if (!ok)err=errno
00181 
00182 //there's not really any socket startup needed on unix, but
00183 //you need to define a signal handler for SIGPIPE to avoid
00184 //broken pipe crashes.
00185 #define OsclSocketStartup(ok)\
00186         signal(SIGPIPE,SIG_IGN);\
00187         ok=true
00188 
00189 #define OsclSocketCleanup(ok)\
00190         signal(SIGPIPE,SIG_DFL);\
00191         ok=true
00192 
00193 //hostent type
00194 typedef struct hostent TOsclHostent;
00195 
00196 //wrapper for gethostbyname
00197 #define OsclGethostbyname(name,hostent,ok,err)\
00198         hostent=gethostbyname((const char*)name);\
00199         ok=(hostent!=NULL);\
00200         if (!ok)err=errno;
00201 
00202 //extract dotted address from a hostent
00203 #define OsclGetDottedAddr(hostent,dottedaddr,ok)\
00204         long *_hostaddr=(long*)hostent->h_addr_list[0];\
00205         struct in_addr _inaddr;\
00206         _inaddr.s_addr=*_hostaddr;\
00207         dottedaddr=inet_ntoa(_inaddr);\
00208         ok=(dottedaddr!=NULL);

00212 #define OSCL_SD_SEND SHUT_WR
00213 #define OSCL_SD_BOTH SHUT_RDWR
